variables.CELEBRATION: Outstanding work, prodigy! Your abilities grow stronger with each session!
variables.OPENING_FLAVOR: Your training begins now. The Lost Cities are counting on you!
variables.CLOSING_FLAVOR: You've mastered these skills! The elvin world is brighter thanks to your progress.
variables.CONTEXT_INTRO: Welcome to {{school}}! Your ability training continues with today's session.
variables.CONTEXT_PROJECT_INTRO: Time for training, prodigy! Today you'll develop essential skills that every elf needs.
variables.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_INTRO: Skilled prodigies anticipate outcomes before acting. Study the code and predict what will happen.
variables.CONTEXT_FILL_BLANKS_INTRO: Every prodigy must know their fundamentals. Complete these training exercises to prove your skills.
variables.CONTEXT_SPOT_DIFFERENCE_INTRO: Attention to detail is crucial for any ability! Compare these code versions and spot what's different.
variables.CONTEXT_CODE_ORDERING_INTRO: Abilities must be channeled in the proper sequence. Arrange these code lines in the correct order.
variables.CONTEXT_MATCH_OUTPUT_INTRO: Connect each code snippet to its output. A prodigy must know exactly what their actions will produce.
variables.CONTEXT_DECODE_ERROR_INTRO: Alert! System malfunctions detected! Analyze these error messages and understand what went wrong.
variables.CONTEXT_COMPLETE_FUNCTION_INTRO: {{mentor}} has started building new elvin utilities. Complete the functions to finish the work.
variables.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_INTRO: Emergency at {{school}}! Several ability training systems have malfunctioned!
variables.CONTEXT_FIX_STYLE_INTRO: Even working code can be improved. A true prodigy writes clean, elegant code.
variables.CONTEXT_DISCOVERY_INTRO: Welcome, new prodigy! Today you begin your training at the finest academy in the Lost Cities.
variables.CONTEXT_LEARNING_OBJECTIVE: Master these fundamental techniques to advance your ability training.
variables.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_PURPOSE: This skill helps you anticipate outcomes before they manifest - essential for any prodigy!
variables.CONTEXT_INCREMENTAL_NARRATIVE: Like all talented prodigies, you'll build your skills session by session.
variables.CONTEXT_CODE_SAMPLE_NARRATIVE: A fellow prodigy submitted this code. It works, but can you spot what needs improvement?
variables.CONTEXT_STUDENT_TASK: Now it's your turn, prodigy. Apply what you've learned!
variables.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_MISSION: As a member of the Debug Squad, you must identify each bug and restore the systems.
variables.CONTEXT_SUCCESS_CRITERIA: Your code should produce exactly the expected output.
variables.CONTEXT_IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDANCE: Start simple, then build up your solution step by step.
variables.CONTEXT_FINAL_ASSEMBLY: Session complete! Run your code to see your ability system in action!
variables.CONTEXT_VERIFICATION_COMPLETE: Verification complete! Check how your predictions matched the actual results.
variables.CONTEXT_ROLE_COMPLETE: Excellent work, prodigy! You've proven your abilities in this training session.
variables.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_COMPLETE: All systems restored! The academy is operational thanks to your debugging skills.
variables.CONTEXT_IMPROVEMENT_COMPLETE: Great work! Your refactored code is now worthy of the Foxfire Archives.
variables.CONTEXT_TRIUMPH_COMPLETE: Congratulations, prodigy! You've completed this challenge and your abilities have grown!
variables.CONTEXT_PHASE_1: Every prodigy starts here. Master this fundamental skill before moving on.
variables.CONTEXT_PHASE_2: Good progress! Now let's expand your abilities.
variables.CONTEXT_PHASE_3: Your powers are growing! Time for more challenging exercises.
variables.CONTEXT_PHASE_4: Final challenge! Combine everything you've learned.
variables.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_GUIDANCE_1: Read the code carefully. What will appear on screen?
variables.CONTEXT_CHALLENGE_2_NARRATIVE: This code demonstrates an important technique. Predict the output.
variables.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_GUIDANCE_2: Pay attention to how values are combined.
variables.CONTEXT_CHALLENGE_3_NARRATIVE: Prodigies must see beyond the obvious. What will this code produce?
variables.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_GUIDANCE_3: Watch for the difference between variable names and string values.
variables.CONTEXT_CHALLENGE_4_NARRATIVE: Calculate the result in your head before running the code.
variables.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_GUIDANCE_4: Remember how Python handles this operation.
variables.CONTEXT_CHALLENGE_5_NARRATIVE: The final test! Predict this calculation correctly.
variables.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_GUIDANCE_5: Think about which operations happen first.
variables.CONTEXT_EXERCISE_1_NARRATIVE: Start with the basics. Every prodigy needs this fundamental skill.
variables.CONTEXT_EXERCISE_2_NARRATIVE: Build on what you learned. This gets a bit more challenging.
variables.CONTEXT_EXERCISE_3_NARRATIVE: Practice makes perfect. Apply your growing skills here.
variables.CONTEXT_EXERCISE_4_NARRATIVE: Combine multiple techniques in this final challenge.
variables.CONTEXT_COMPARISON_1_NARRATIVE: One version works, one doesn't. Can you spot why?
variables.CONTEXT_COMPARISON_2_NARRATIVE: Both run without errors, but they produce different results. Why?
variables.CONTEXT_COMPARISON_3_NARRATIVE: A subtle difference causes a big problem. Find it!
variables.CONTEXT_ORDERING_1_NARRATIVE: Arrange these lines so the program runs correctly.
variables.CONTEXT_ORDERING_2_NARRATIVE: Put the operations in the right order.
variables.CONTEXT_ORDERING_3_NARRATIVE: Make the output tell a coherent story.
variables.CONTEXT_ORDERING_4_NARRATIVE: Each step depends on the previous one. Get the order right!
variables.CONTEXT_MATCH_SET_1_NARRATIVE: Connect each code snippet to its output.
variables.CONTEXT_MATCH_SET_2_NARRATIVE: These snippets mix strings and numbers. Match carefully!
variables.CONTEXT_ERROR_1_NARRATIVE: This code malfunctioned! Analyze the error message to understand why.
variables.CONTEXT_ERROR_2_NARRATIVE: Python couldn't even run this code. What's wrong?
variables.CONTEXT_ERROR_3_NARRATIVE: An invalid operation caused this crash. Identify and fix it.
variables.CONTEXT_FUNCTION_1_NARRATIVE: Complete this function to format a welcome message for new prodigies.
variables.CONTEXT_FUNCTION_2_NARRATIVE: Build a function that displays a prodigy's ability scores.
variables.CONTEXT_FUNCTION_3_NARRATIVE: Create a function that calculates light energy and formats the result.
variables.CONTEXT_CASE_1_NARRATIVE: An ability simulation is producing wrong results!
variables.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_PROMPT_1: Look at the variable types. Is something stored incorrectly?
variables.CONTEXT_CASE_2_NARRATIVE: The registry display shows the wrong information!
variables.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_PROMPT_2: Check what's inside the quotes. Is a variable being printed correctly?
variables.CONTEXT_CASE_3_NARRATIVE: Calculations look correct, but the output is wrong!
variables.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_PROMPT_3: Trace which variable is actually being printed.
variables.CONTEXT_CASE_4_NARRATIVE: The Imparter message is crashing with a type error!
variables.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_PROMPT_4: Can you combine strings and numbers directly with +?
variables.CONTEXT_STYLE_1_NARRATIVE: This code works but uses terrible variable names.
variables.CONTEXT_STYLE_FIX_1: Rename the variables to be clear and descriptive.
variables.CONTEXT_STYLE_2_NARRATIVE: This code is cramped and hard to read.
variables.CONTEXT_STYLE_3_NARRATIVE: This code needs a complete style overhaul.
variables.CONTEXT_STYLE_FIX_3: Apply all style improvements: names, spacing, and modern string formatting.
variables.CONTEXT_DISCOVERY_NARRATIVE: Study how experienced prodigies use these techniques. Predict the outcomes before running the code.
variables.CONTEXT_GUIDANCE_INTRO: Now practice with support. We'll guide you through each step.
variables.CONTEXT_GUIDANCE_NARRATIVE: Complete these guided exercises. The structure is provided - you fill in the details.
variables.CONTEXT_GROWTH_INTRO: Time to manifest on your own! Create your own solution using what you've learned.
variables.CONTEXT_GROWTH_NARRATIVE: No more hand-holding. Show us your abilities, prodigy!
